title: Cookie Consent
description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.
necessaryDesc: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
analyticsDesc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.
preferencesDesc: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced features.
policyIntro: For more information about how we use cookies, please visit our
contactInfo: If you have any questions, please contact us at
acceptAllToastDesc: All cookie preferences have been saved.
acceptSelectedToastDesc: Your cookie preferences have been saved.
